title: Jude the Obscure - how Jude regards his situation

content.question: Which of the following best describes how Jude regards his own situation?

choices.label: He is ambitious but unmotivated to work.
He is clever but easily discouraged.
He is curious and easily distracted.
He is friendless and alienated from the world.

content.answer: He is friendless and alienated from the world.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
